Description: This App allows attendance capture and location determination of field-assigned employees. A "selfie" function is also included that provides the manager a visual indication of the surroundings at the time when the transaction occurred.
Summary: Captures GPS and time data like attendance, supports online and offline mode.
Features: GPS, Fool Proof time data capturing, Error Reporting, Time Data History, QR code setup
Tools: Ionic3, AngularJS, CSS3, HTML5, JavaScript, Cordova(Camera,QR) API, Google Maps API
